name: Marcus 'Territory Commander' Kane

specialAbilities.name: Territory Claim
specialAbilities.description: Can initiate territory claiming rituals. Gain advantage on Persuasion and Intimidation checks when dealing with territory disputes.

specialAbilities.name: Strategic Command
specialAbilities.description: Grant allies within 30ft bonus to initiative rolls equal to Charisma modifier. Can command territory defense structures remotely.

specialAbilities.name: Resource Optimization
specialAbilities.description: Increase resource generation of controlled territories by 25%. Can identify optimal locations for new settlements.

specialAbilities.name: Battle Master Maneuvers
specialAbilities.description: Knows 5 maneuvers: Commander's Strike, Tactical Assessment, Rally, Menacing Attack, Goading Attack

achievements: Victor of the Three Rivers Campaign

backstory: Marcus Kane was born into nobility before the Great Collapse, but emerged as a true leader in the post-apocalyptic world. His tactical genius and natural charisma made him invaluable to the Iron Dominion Faction. As a Territory Commander, he's responsible for managing multiple settlements and defense networks across the faction's holdings. His exposure to Tikkun energy has enhanced his strategic thinking and given him an almost supernatural ability to predict enemy movements. He's known for turning small outposts into thriving settlements and has never lost a territory under his direct command.
personalityTraits: I always plan three moves ahead in any situation
I believe in leading from the front, but thinking from above
ideals: Order: A well-organized territory is a strong territory
Growth: Every settlement should strive to become something greater
bonds: The Iron Dominion Faction gave me purpose after the collapse
Every settlement under my command is like family to me
flaws: I sometimes sacrifice individual needs for the greater strategic picture
I have trouble trusting other faction's territorial claims
